text: Cruising is a 1980 American erotic crime drama movie directed by William Friedkin. It stars Al Pacino, Karen Allen, Paul Sorvino, Ed O'Neill, Powers Boothe and it is based loosely on the book of the same name by Gerald Walker about a serial killer who stalks on gay men. It was nominated for three Razzies at the 1st Golden Raspberry Awards in 1981. == Other websites == * Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980 crime movies Category:1980 thriller movies Category:1980 LGBT movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:German crime movies Category:German thriller movies Category:German drama movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by William Friedkin
title: Cruising (movie)
